resources.string: Must contain at least one uppercase letter.
Must contain at least one lowercase letter.
Must contain at least one digit.
You can scan links manually when in doubt
Application is not fully support for Android 14 (SDK Version 34)
Password reset is not available at this time.
*Please do not click on this link.
Turn on/off notifications when links are detected.
Setting notifications based on the type of links detected.
Setting up automatic link verification channels.
Please read and understand this Personal Data Protection Policy carefully. To be aware of the protection policy Personal information of our application The details are as follows:
Respecting the privacy rights of service users

1. This project respects and gives importance to rights. Personal information and protection of your personal information, and you would like to receive security and safety in using the service through our application

2. Your personal information that the project receives, such as name, telephone number, etc., which can identify you and is personal information that is complete, accurate, up-to-date, and of good quality, will be used in accordance with the objectives. Operation of projects only and projects Strict measures will be taken to maintain security. as well as preventing personal information from being used without your permission.
Purpose of access to personal information
1. Project to access your personal information For the operation of projects, studies, research or the preparation of statistics. which is in line with the objectives of the project operations.
2. Project to access your personal information By analyzing To know the safety of clicking on the links you receive. and not fall prey to criminal groups.

3. Project to access your personal information By bringing information of You come to analyze and use the services of external agencies that have access to your information. To know the safety of the link that you received and not fall prey to criminal groups.
1. Project to collect your personal information for operation Project work, study, research or statistics preparation which is based on Objectives of project operations.
2. If later there is a change in the purpose of collection Personal information of the project will be notified to you and requested. Consent and provide a record of the amendments as evidence.
3. The project will not take any action. different from that specified in the objective of data collection, except.
- The new purpose has been informed to service users. and receive consent from service users.
- It is a case specified by law.
1. The project will be able to use and disclose your personal information. Only with your consent and must be used for the purposes of the project only.
2. The project will ensure that project workers do not disclose, display, or make available in any other manner personal information. of yours other than the purpose or to third parties, unless.
- Written consent has been received from you.
- It is a case specified by law.
- It is for your benefit. and requesting consent could not be done at that time.
- It is for the benefit of your life, health, or safety and other users of the service.
- For the benefit of the investigation of the investigating officer. or the court adjudication.
- For the benefit of studying, researching or preparing statistics.

4. In some cases, the project may allow other people or agencies to access or use your personal information as necessary. and to follow Objectives and responsibilities of the project However, the project must receive your consent first.

The project recognizes the importance of maintaining the security of your personal information. The project therefore requires Measures to maintain the security of personal information Appropriately and in accordance with maintaining the confidentiality of personal information to prevent loss, access, destruction, use, conversion, modification, or disclosure of personal information without right or illegally, in accordance with the policies and guidelines. To maintain the information technology security of the project.
Changes to Personal Data Protection Policy

The project may update this privacy policy. To be consistent with Project operations and suggestions, opinions from you. The project will announce changes to you promptly. Be clear before you start implementing changes. or may send an announcement Notify you directly.
